HttpRequestInfo.Name: INT-ToolsService-Billingadmin
HttpRequestInfo.Remarks:
1. https://api.tools.cp.microsoft-int.com/toolsservice/billingadmin/echo/hello
2. regenerate invoice: reuqestURL:https://api.tools.cp.microsoft-int.com/toolsservice/billingadmin/regenerate/invoices parameters:[{"AccountId":12345,"InvoiceNumber":"E0100005D6"}]
3. regenerate pdf: reuqestURL:https://api.tools.cp.microsoft-int.com/toolsservice/billingadmin/regenerate/invoice-pdfs parameters:[{"AccountId":12345,"InvoiceNumber":"E0100005D6"}]
4. regenerate BID: reuqestURL:https://api.tools.cp.microsoft-int.com/toolsservice/billingadmin/regenerate/bids parameters:[{"AccountId":12345,"InvoiceNumber":"E0100005D6"}]
5. regenerate Order: reuqestURL:https://api.tools.cp.microsoft-int.com/toolsservice/billingadmin/resend/orders parameters:[{"AccountId":12345,"OrderId":"92ffe6ba-e1f2-4a08-b222-a75b3e1d72f2","SubscriptionId":1}]
6. regenerate Customer: reuqestURL:https://api.tools.cp.microsoft-int.com/toolsservice/billingadmin/resend/customers parameters:[{"AccountId":12345,"CustomerId":"uQsAAAAAAAABAAAF"}]
7. regenerate HCTI: reuqestURL:https://api.tools.cp.microsoft-int.com/toolsservice/billingadmin/resend/hctis parameters:[{"AccountId":12345,"BillingPeriods":[20140401]}]
8. download invoice xml file: reuqestURL:https://api.tools.cp.microsoft-int.com/toolsservice/billingadmin/search/invoice-pdfs parameters:[{"AccountId":12345,"OrderId":"CD4AF36E-F288-4733-AE5D-07957B1DC98A","InvoiceDate":"2014-03-01"}]
add "65.55.252.49 api.tools.cp.microsoft-int.com" in C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\hosts(MF_Tools_API)

HttpRequestInfo.Name: GetSafeApproval_Approvaled_Summary
HttpRequestInfo.RequestParameters: $filter=BalanceCreateDate ge datetime'2015-08-01T00:00:00' and BalanceCreateDate le datetime'2015-08-31T23:59:59' and PayoutPartner eq guid'50f51e15-7bc6-47bf-99b3-f1d445eb3dcd' and (BalanceStatusType eq 'ReadyForSafeApproval' or BalanceStatusType eq 'SafeAssignedForApproval' or BalanceStatusType eq 'SafeAssignedForRejection' or BalanceStatusType eq 'SafeApprovalHeld' or BalanceStatusType eq 'SafeRejected' or BalanceStatusType eq 'SafeApproved' or BalanceStatusType eq 'ReadyForFundingApproval' or BalanceStatusType eq 'FundingApproved' or BalanceStatusType eq 'ReadyForPayout' or BalanceStatusType eq 'PayoutSubmitted' or BalanceStatusType eq 'PayoutSuccess' or BalanceStatusType eq 'FundingRejected' or BalanceStatusType eq 'PayoutFailed')&$skip=0

HttpRequestInfo.Name: GetSafeApproval_Approvaled_Table
HttpRequestInfo.RequestParameters: $filter=BalanceCreateDate ge datetime'2015-08-01T00:00:00' and BalanceCreateDate le datetime'2015-08-31T23:59:59' and PayoutPartner eq guid'50f51e15-7bc6-47bf-99b3-f1d445eb3dcd' and (BalanceStatusType eq 'SafeApproved' or BalanceStatusType eq 'ReadyForFundingApproval' or BalanceStatusType eq 'FundingApproved' or BalanceStatusType eq 'ReadyForPayout' or BalanceStatusType eq 'PayoutSubmitted' or BalanceStatusType eq 'PayoutSuccess' or BalanceStatusType eq 'FundingRejected' or BalanceStatusType eq 'PayoutFailed')&$orderby=BalanceAmountUsd desc&$skip=0

ClientCertInfo.FindValue: CN=SPK_PARTNER_TEST, OU=SPG, O=MS, L=Redmond, S=WA, C=US, E=test@microsoft.com

HttpRequestInfo.Name: GetCurrentMonthAllBalances

HttpRequestInfo.Name: Get_Balances
HttpRequestInfo.RequestUrl: https://subledger.cp.microsoft-int.com/balances?$filter=BalanceCreateDate ge datetime'2015-04-01T00:00:00' and BalanceCreateDate le datetime'2015-12-30T23:59:59' and BalanceId eq guid'14c7d116-ce5c-e511-80c1-f01faff0a20e'
HttpRequestInfo.Remarks:
and PayoutPartner eq guid'cc85ceb9-ac53-4ea8-8bc4-1c978cef406d' and BalanceCreateDate ge datetime'2015-04-01T00:00:00' and BalanceCreateDate le datetime'2015-09-30T23:59:59' and BalanceAmountUsd ge 0 and BalanceAmountUsd le 1000000 and BalanceId eq guid'14c7d116-ce5c-e511-80c1-f01faff0a20e' and PayoutAccountId eq '2b6320b4-82ea-4fd2-aa34-173c48bed633' and BillableAccountId eq 67385250 and PaymentMethodType eq 'AchCredit' and TargetCountry eq 'US' and TargetCurrency eq 'USD' and BalanceStatusType eq 'ReadyForFundingApproval' and PayoutCompanyCode eq '1548' and PayoutType eq 'Adhoc'
and PayoutCompanyCode ne null &$skip=0 &$orderby=BalanceAmountUsd desc
